short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popular text editor for software developers. Integrated with cloud storage, available on any device and platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vim is just one of more than 230 applications available in the cloud on rollApp. Check out the full list at https://www.rollapp.com/apps.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Working with files requires creating account with rollApp and connecting cloud storage (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive or Box)
- Free rollApp account allows to access your files in read-only mode. Please, subscribe for rollApp Premium to be able to save files

rollApp lets you use Vim and hundreds of other apps without any installation and updates on any device right from a browser. You can open and edit documents from your Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive or Box. Perfect for Chromebooks, tablets and even phones!

GVim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text editing. GVim has a number of options that make using the application especially easy. The pop-out menus guarantee easy access, while the tiered interface makes working from multiple documents even easier.
